snippet: After a long journey, two huge phoenixes by the Chinese artist Xu Bing have risen above the nave of the Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine.
abstract: Two huge phoenixes made out of debris by Chinese artist Xu Bing are being installed at Cathedral Church of St John the Divine.
lead_paragraph: After a long journey, two huge phoenixes by the Chinese artist Xu Bing have risen above the nave of the Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine.

headline.seo: Xu Bing Installs His Sculptures at St. John the Divine
headline.main: Phoenixes Rise in China and Float in New York
headline.print_headline: Phoenixes Rise in China and Float in New York

keywords.value: Cathedral Church of St John the Divine (Manhattan, NY)
